text: Ignacio Avila Rodriguez (born January 19, 1979 in Manresa) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is T12/B2 type athlete. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished second in the 4 X 400 meter T11-T13 race. He raced at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. He raced at the 2008 Summer Paralympics. He finished third in the 1,500 meter race.
